definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 15:6 green, greenness (on yarqo0 in gardens, v. Nö:ZMG 1876, 777 Löw:p. 236 f.)—abs. Ex 10:15, Is 15:6; cstr. Ge 1:30 + 3 t.;—[[יֶרֶק עֵשֶׂב]] Ge 1:30, Ge 9:3 (both P); [[יֶרֶק דֶּשֶׁא]] Ps 37:2 [[יֶרֶק הַשָּׂדֶה]] Nu 22:4 (E) = green thing, grass; alone Ex 10:15 (J) green thing, incl. [[עֵץ]] and [[עֵשֶׂב]], Is 15:6.
